sqlReaderQuery.value:
WITH CTE AS(

SELECT OWNER_NAME,
OWNER_ADDRESS,
OWNER_CITY,
OWNER_STATE,
OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
COUNTRY_CODE,
B_SOURCE_ID,
--ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY B_SOURCE_ID ORDER BY OWNER_NAME,OWNER_ADDRESS DESC) AS RNK
rank() over(partition by B_Source_ID order by ltrim(rtrim(OWNER_NAME))) as rnk
FROM  [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteOwner]
)
SELECT  DISTINCT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,
      [OWNER_NAME] AS OWNER_NAME
      ,[OWNER_ADDRESS] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[OWNER_CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[OWNER_STATE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[OWNER_POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
	,'INITIALLOAD' as [B_PUBID]
	,'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME
	, B_Source_ID AS [B_SOURCEID]
       ,Country_Code as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE FROM CTE WHERE RNK=1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'SiteMasterLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'Site Master Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
      @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[SITE_NAME] AS SITE_NAME
      ,[SITE_TYPE] AS SITE_TYPE
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) as ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION] AS SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID] AS B_SOURCEID
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE2] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE2
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CAST(OPERATIONS_START_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_START_DATE
      ,CAST(CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE
      ,CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
	,FS_SITE_OWNER as [FS_SITE_OWNER]
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
	,FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT as [FP_WAREHOUSE_PARENT]
	,FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT AS [FS_WAREHOUSE_PARENT]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMain]    
WHERE FS_SITE_OWNER IS NOT NULL AND COUNTRY_CODE in ('USA','United States') AND [B_SOURCE_ID] IS NOT NULL

SELECT   @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
       ,FP_SITE_MAIN
      ,NEWID() AS [Site_Contact_ID]
      ,[CONTACT_FIRST_NAME]
      ,[CONTACT_LAST_NAME]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_EMAIL]
      ,[SITE_CONTACT_TYPE]
      ,[FS_SITE_MAIN]
	,'SiteContact' as B_CLASSNAME
FROM [Retail].[DACSiteContact]

SELECT 
       @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
     ,[FP_SITE_MAIN]
      ,'SiteDefaultHours' as B_CLASSNAME
	  ,NEWID() AS [SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS_ID]
      ,[SITE_HOURS_TYPE]
      ,[DAY_OF_WEEK]
      ,[START_TIME]
      ,[END_TIME]
      ,[FS_SITE_MAIN]
  FROM [Retail].[DACSiteDefaultHours]

SELECT 
      @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[SITE_NAME] AS SITE_NAME
      ,[SITE_TYPE] AS SITE_TYPE
	  ,SITE_DESCRIPTION as SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) as ISACTIVE
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[B_SOURCEID] AS B_SOURCEID
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
	  ,[ADDRESS_LINE2] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE2
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
	,'DAC' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
	 ,[SITE_SHIP_TO]
      ,[RAW_MAIN_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_FAX]
      ,[RAW_CS_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CS_EMAIL]
      ,[RAW_SALES_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_SALES_CHAT]
      ,[RAW_SERVICE_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_SERVICE_CHAT]
  FROM [Retail].[DACLoadSiteMain]

SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) AS ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION]
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE]
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1]
      ,[CITY]
      ,[STATE_CODE]
      ,[POSTAL_CODE]
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CASE WHEN OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA='?' THEN NULL ELSE  CONVERT(decimal(16,4),  convert(float,replace([OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],',','') )) 
	  END AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA
      ,[FS_SITE_OWNER]
	  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMainRDC] WHERE RNK=1

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'FullDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'Full Data Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
     @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[SITE_NAME] AS SITE_NAME
      ,[SITE_TYPE] AS SITE_TYPE
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) as ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION] AS SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID] AS B_SOURCEID
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE2] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE2
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CAST(OPERATIONS_START_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_START_DATE
      ,CAST(CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE
      ,CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
	,FS_SITE_OWNER as [FS_SITE_OWNER]
	,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMain]    
WHERE FS_SITE_OWNER IS NOT NULL AND COUNTRY_CODE in ('USA','United States') AND [B_SOURCE_ID] IS NOT NULL

SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[B_SOURCE_ID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE
      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION]
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE]
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1]
      ,[CITY]
      ,[STATE_CODE]
      ,[POSTAL_CODE]
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE]
      ,[LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_AREA]
      ,CASE WHEN OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA='?' THEN NULL ELSE  CONVERT(decimal(16,4),  convert(float,replace([OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],',','') )) 
	  END AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA
      ,[FS_SITE_OWNER]
	  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
  ,'INITIALLOAD' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
  FROM [Retail].[InitialLoadSiteMainRDC] WHERE RNK=1

SELECT DISTINCT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,
      [OWNER_NAME] AS OWNER_NAME
      ,[OWNER_ADDRESS] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[OWNER_CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[OWNER_STATE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[OWNER_POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
	  ,'INITIALLOAD' as [B_PUBID]
	  ,'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME
	  ,( concat(ltrim(rtrim(upper(OWNER_NAME))),
'_',ltrim(rtrim(upper(OWNER_ADDRESS))),
'_',ltrim(rtrim(upper(OWNER_CITY))),
'_',ltrim(rtrim(upper(OWNER_STATE))),'_',
ltrim(rtrim(upper(OWNER_POSTAL_CODE))))) AS [B_SOURCEID]
  FROM [dbo].[SD_SITE_OWNER]

      ,[SITE_DESCRIPTION] AS SITE_DESCRIPTION

SELECT 
       @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,'DAC' AS B_PUBID
      ,[B_SOURCEID]
      ,[SITE_NAME]
      ,[SITE_TYPE]
      ,CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
      ,[SITE_SHIP_TO]
      ,[RAW_MAIN_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_FAX]
      ,[RAW_CS_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CS_EMAIL]
      ,[RAW_SALES_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_SALES_CHAT]

      ,[RAW_SERVICE_CHAT]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'masterDataHub_Retail'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'FullDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'Full Data Load'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
WITH CTE AS (
select
ProspectID as B_Source_ID,
Location as SITE_NAME,
StoreType as SITE_TYPE,
CAST(1 AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE,
'NA' as SITE_DESCRIPTION,
case
when LicenseeContact collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS='Corporate' Then 'Direct'
Else 'Licensee' end as OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
StoreAddress as RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
'' as RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
City as RAWCITY,
StateProvince as RAWSTATE_CODE,
ZIP as RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
Country as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
SoftOpenDate as [OPERATIONS_START_DATE],
[Closure Date] as [OPERATIONS_END_DATE],
SoftOpenDate as [CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE],
[Closure Date] as [CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE],
'SQUAREFEET' as [LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE],
'USD' as [LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE],
ShowroomSqFt as [CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA],
'' as [OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],
AccountNum as FS_SITE_OWNER,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad]
union
select distinct
RDCShipTo as B_Source_ID,
Location as SITE_NAME,
'Warehouse' as SITE_TYPE,
CAST(1 AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE,
'NA' as SITE_DESCRIPTION,
case
when LicenseeContact collate SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS='Corporate' Then 'Direct'
Else 'Licensee' end as OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
RDCAddress as RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
'' as RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
RDCCity as RAWCITY,
RDCState as RAWSTATE_CODE,
RDCZip as RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
Country as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
'' as [OPERATIONS_START_DATE],
'' as [OPERATIONS_END_DATE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE],
LocalUnitofMeasureArea as [LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE],
Currency as [LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA],
RDCSqFt as [OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],
AccountNum as FS_SITE_OWNER,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad]
where RDCAddress<>'' and RDCCity<>'' and RDCState<>'' and RDCZip<>'' and AccountNum='99999991TSTID1101'
union
select
storeid as B_Source_ID,
'' as SITE_NAME,
'Warehouse' AS SITE_TYPE,
CAST(1 AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE,
'NA' as SITE_DESCRIPTION,
'Licensee' as OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
[StreetAddress1] as RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
[StreetAddress2] as RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
[City] as RAWCITY,
[State] as RAWSTATE_CODE,
[ZipCode] as RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
[CountryId] as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
'' as [OPERATIONS_START_DATE],
'' as [OPERATIONS_END_DATE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE],
'SQUAREFEET' as [LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE],
'USD' as [LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA],
'' as [OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],
'' as FS_SITE_OWNER,
'DAC' AS B_PUBID,
'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_DAC])
SELECT
@{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,
B_Source_ID,
SITE_NAME,
SITE_TYPE,
ISACTIVE,
SITE_DESCRIPTION,
OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATE_CODE,
RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
CAST(OPERATIONS_START_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_START_DATE,
CAST(OPERATIONS_END_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_END_DATE,
CAST(CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE,
CAST(CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE,
LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE,
LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
--CAST(CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA as DECIMAL(12,4)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA,
CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA,
CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA)) AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA,
--CAST(OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA AS DECIMAL(12,4)) AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA ,
FS_SITE_OWNER,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME
FROM CTE

WITH CTE1 AS(
select distinct
Entity as OWNER_NAME,
CorporationAddress as OWNER_ADDRESS,
CorpCity as OWNER_CITY,
CorpState as OWNER_STATE,
CorpZip OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
Country as COUNTRY_CODE,
AccountNum as B_Source_ID,
'INITIALLOAD' as [B_PUBID],
'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME

from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad]
union
select distinct Entity as OWNER_NAME,
RDCAddress as OWNER_ADDRESS,
RDCCity as OWNER_CITY,
RDCState as OWNER_STATE,
RDCZip OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
Country as COUNTRY_CODE,
Concat('W',AccountNum) as B_Source_ID,
'INITIALLOAD' as B_PUBID,
'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad] where RDCAddress<>'' and RDCCity<>'' and RDCState<>'' and RDCZip<>''
)
SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,

OWNER_NAME,
OWNER_ADDRESS,
OWNER_CITY,
OWNER_STATE,
OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
COUNTRY_CODE,
B_Source_ID,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME FROM CTE1

       ,FP_SITE_MAIN
      ,NEWID() AS [Site_Contact_ID]
      ,[CONTACT_FIRST_NAME]
      ,[CONTACT_LAST_NAME]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CONTACT_EMAIL]
      ,[SITE_CONTACT_TYPE]
      ,[FS_SITE_MAIN]
	,'SiteContact' as B_CLASSNAME
FROM [Retail].[DACSiteContact]

SELECT 
       @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
     ,[FP_SITE_MAIN]
      ,'SiteDefaultHours' as B_CLASSNAME
	  ,NEWID() AS [SITE_DEFAULT_HOURS_ID]

      ,[END_TIME]
      ,[FS_SITE_MAIN]
  FROM [Retail].[DACSiteDefaultHours]

SELECT 
      @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID
      ,[SITE_NAME] AS SITE_NAME
      ,[SITE_TYPE] AS SITE_TYPE
	  ,SITE_DESCRIPTION as SITE_DESCRIPTION
      ,CONVERT(BIT, (CASE WHEN [IS_ACTIVE] ='NULL' THEN 0 ELSE CAST([IS_ACTIVE] AS BIT) END)) as ISACTIVE
      ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] AS SITE_OWNERSHIP_TYPE
      ,[B_SOURCEID] AS B_SOURCEID
      ,[ADDRESS_LINE1] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE1
	  ,[ADDRESS_LINE2] AS RAWADDRESS_LINE2
      ,[CITY] AS RAWCITY
      ,[STATE_CODE] AS RAWSTATE_CODE
      ,[POSTAL_CODE] AS RAWPOSTAL_CODE
      ,[COUNTRY_CODE] AS RAWCOUNTRY_CODE
	  ,B_PUBID
	,'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
	,'DAC' AS [FP_SITE_OWNER]
	 ,[SITE_SHIP_TO]
      ,[RAW_MAIN_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_FAX]
      ,[RAW_CS_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_CS_EMAIL]
      ,[RAW_SALES_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_SALES_CHAT]
      ,[RAW_SERVICE_PHONE]
      ,[RAW_SERVICE_CHAT]
  FROM [Retail].[DACLoadSiteMain]

CAST(1 AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE,

case

Currency as [LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA],
RDCSqFt as [OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],
AccountNum as FS_SITE_OWNER,
'INITIALLOAD' AS B_PUBID,
'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad]
where RDCAddress<>'' and RDCCity<>'' and RDCState<>'' and RDCZip<>''
union
select
storeid as B_Source_ID,
'' as SITE_NAME,
'Warehouse' AS SITE_TYPE,
CAST(1 AS BIT) AS ISACTIVE,
'NA' as SITE_DESCRIPTION,
'Licensee' as OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
[StreetAddress1] as RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
[StreetAddress2] as RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
[City] as RAWCITY,
[State] as RAWSTATE_CODE,
[ZipCode] as RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
[CountryId] as RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
'' as [OPERATIONS_START_DATE],
'' as [OPERATIONS_END_DATE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE],
'SQUAREFEET' as [LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE],
'USD' as [LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE],
'' as [CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA],
'' as [OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA],
'' as FS_SITE_OWNER,
'DAC' AS B_PUBID,
'SiteMain' as B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_DAC])
SELECT
@{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,
B_Source_ID,
SITE_NAME,
SITE_TYPE,
ISACTIVE,
SITE_DESCRIPTION,
OWNERSHIP_TYPE,
RAWADDRESS_LINE1,
RAWADDRESS_LINE2,
RAWCITY,
RAWSTATE_CODE,
RAWPOSTAL_CODE,
RAWCOUNTRY_CODE,
CAST(OPERATIONS_START_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_START_DATE,
CAST(OPERATIONS_END_DATE AS DATE) AS OPERATIONS_END_DATE,
CAST(CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_OPEN_DATE,
CAST(CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE AS DATE) AS CUSTOMER_CLOSE_DATE,
LOCAL_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ARE,
LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE,
--CAST(CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA as DECIMAL(12,4)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA,
CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA)) AS CUSTOMER_SITE_AREA,
CONVERT(decimal(12,4),CONVERT(float,OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA)) AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA,
--CAST(OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA AS DECIMAL(12,4)) AS OPERATIONS_SITE_AREA ,
FS_SITE_OWNER,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME
FROM CTE

WITH CTE1 AS(
select distinct
Entity as OWNER_NAME,
CorporationAddress as OWNER_ADDRESS,
CorpCity as OWNER_CITY,
CorpState as OWNER_STATE,
CorpZip OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
Country as COUNTRY_CODE,
AccountNum as B_Source_ID,
'INITIALLOAD' as [B_PUBID],
'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME

from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad]
union
select distinct Entity as OWNER_NAME,
RDCAddress as OWNER_ADDRESS,
RDCCity as OWNER_CITY,
RDCState as OWNER_STATE,
RDCZip OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
Country as COUNTRY_CODE,
Concat('W',AccountNum) as B_Source_ID,
'INITIALLOAD' as B_PUBID,
'SiteOwner' AS B_CLASSNAME
from [RetailSite].[TestData_Warehouse_InitialLoad] where RDCAddress<>'' and RDCCity<>'' and RDCState<>'' and RDCZip<>''
)
SELECT @{activity('Get_New_Load').output.firstRow.RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT} AS B_LoadID,

OWNER_NAME,
OWNER_ADDRESS,
OWNER_CITY,
OWNER_STATE,
OWNER_POSTAL_CODE,
COUNTRY_CODE,
B_Source_ID,
B_PUBID,
B_CLASSNAME FROM CTE1
